headline.print_headline: American Tells Harrowing Story at NY Terror Trial
headline.main: American Tells Harrowing Story at NY Terror Trial

lead_paragraph: A Texas woman shot in the leg during a 1998 terrorist attack on tourists in Yemen told her harrowing story to a jury at the trial of an Egyptian cleric Tuesday, saying she didn't know whether she was about to be freed or killed when a kidnapper announced: "It's goodbye to you all!"
